attributes.text: A dialog widget used to confirm a question or proposed course of action
Returns singleton instance of this class. This method has to be part of any subclass extending this widget.
Fired on change of the property {@link #noButtonIcon}.
Fired on change of the property {@link #noButtonLabel}.
Fired on change of the property {@link #yesButtonIcon}.
Fired on change of the property {@link #yesButtonLabel}.
Create the main content of the widget
Handle click on no button. Calls callback with a “false” value
Handle click on yes button. Calls callback with a “true” value
